body:
Comment 4: 
This is due at least in part to an lldb bug: http://llvm.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=18648.

Once that is resolved, I'll look again at lldb support, and resume working on automated
tests for debugger integration (issue #7161).

(This is all mildly ironic, since I hardly ever use debuggers, but it is proving an
interesting, instructive, and fun distraction.)
